Definition.WordDefinition:
Bedrock
A {C++} {class} library for {Macintosh} user interface portability.

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Bed rock \Bed" rock"\ (Mining) The solid rock underlying superficial formations. Also Fig. [1913 Webster]

bedrock n 1: solid unweathered rock lying beneath surface deposits of soil 2: principles from which other truths can be derived; "first you must learn the fundamentals"; "let's get down to basics" [syn: {fundamentals}, {basics}, {fundamental principle}, {basic principle}]
